message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a fantastic product that I think you'd be very interested in. It's worth at least $10000 to me, but I'm open to negotiation. Would you be interested in purchasing it for $15000? Let me know what you think!
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on it. I am willing to pay $14000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your interest.  While I value the product highly, $14000 is a bit below what I'm aiming for. Would you be willing to go up to $14500? I think that would make a fair deal for both of us.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $14200 for the product.
